reviewText: This movie of Rwanda-1996 is an astonishing contemporary testimony to modern genocide as the UN inaction and incapability of the western values practically affected local realities in a post-Holocaust, still atrocities-inclined world.

"Shooting Dogs" is not for the faint of heart! It is very intense. This is not the typical stupid Hollywood production. " Shooting Dogs" is a great human drama with a great story and fantastic acting !
